sentences.english: Youth and juveniles are the main part of immoralities on web.
sentences.chinese: 青少年是互聯網上不道德行爲的重要主體。

sentences.english: An arrogant person will act as though he is better than others.
sentences.chinese: 一個傲慢的人總表現出好像比別人技高一籌的德行。

sentences.english: So, exalted mitzvah is a basis that leads cadre politics life.
sentences.chinese: 所以，高尚的德行是一個領導幹部政治生命的根基。

sentences.english: Chuang-tzu's theory of man's nature, simplisy, is the base of his theory of cultivating virtues.
sentences.chinese: 莊子的人性素樸論是其德行修養觀的基石。

sentences.english: Nothing but death can reconcile envy to virtue .
sentences.chinese: 別無他物，只有死亡能使忌妒和德行重新言好。

sentences.english: Moral behavior, however, is scattered all over the chart.
sentences.chinese: 但是道德行爲卻分散在曲線圖的每個角落。

sentences.english: This is the crux of the issue with respect to ethical behavior for industrial software developers.
sentences.chinese: 這正是有關工業軟件開發者道德行爲問題的結症所在。

sentences.english: But the king not succeed, it can MingJiDe…
sentences.chinese: 國王不丟棄百姓，所以能張顯他的德行。

sentences.english: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace, and things wherewith one may edify another.
sentences.chinese: 所以我們務要追求和睦的事，與彼此建立德行的事。

sentences.english: What difference does it make if the person calling you a slut is one as well?
sentences.chinese: 就算叫你騷貨的人自己也是一個德行，又怎麼樣呢？

sentences.english: Extraterrestrials are critical of the people's amoral behavior referring to the humans' interference in nature's processes.
sentences.chinese: 天外來客對人類干預自然進程的超道德行爲表示譴責。

sentences.english: Young people, virtue can not afford to lose yo.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人，德行可不能丟喲。

sentences.english: Jenny: I'm your sister. It's what I do. (
sentences.chinese: 我是你老妹，我就這德行。

sentences.english: Be in need of the woman looks after of man, again handsome is also this character.
sentences.chinese: 缺少女人照顧的男人啊，再帥也就是這德行。

sentences.english: Are we rewarded for our virtue and for our virtuous deeds?
sentences.chinese: 我們會因爲貞操以及貞操的德行得到報償麼？

sentences.english: Even the church today is not immune to the mainstreaming of immorality.
sentences.chinese: 即使是今天的教會也不能倖免於主流的不道德行爲。

definition: sense of propriety, justice, integrity and honor (i.e. the four social bonds, 四維|四维[si4 wei2])
